data.scheme_name: Maharashtra New Information Technology and Information Technology Enabled Services (IT/ITES) Policy, 2023 - Promotion of Emerging Technologies - Electricity Duty Exemption - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides permanent exemptions from payment of electricity duty from the date of commencement of production/ activity.
data.eligibility: All  IT & ITES units in the state are eligible under the scheme.
data.conditions:
1. The exemption from payment of electricity duty shall be given to the projects mentioned in the notification only after producing registration certificate of the Directorate of Industries or Software Technology Parks of India (STPI) or other Competent Authority. 
  2. The exemption shall commence with effect from the date when the unit specified above start production or rendering the services.
data.beneficiaries: All  IT & ITES units in the state are eligible under the scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The exemption from payment of electricity duty shall be given to the projects mentioned in the notification only after producing registration certificate of Directorate of Industries or Software Technology Parks of India (STPI) or other Competent Authority. 
  2. The exemption shall commence with effect from the date when the unit specified above start production or rendering the services.
data.context: This policy is introduced to make Maharashtra a global IT &ITES destination and the Technology capital of India, moving towards innovative, equitable, inclusive and sustainable Technology Development.
data.objective: To ensure Maharashtra as the most preferred destination for investment and innovation among global IT&ITES enterprises through Strategic Policy Interventions, Development of Competitive Advantage and Enabling Business Environment.
data.description:
1. Exemption for payment of electricity duty from the date of commencement of production/ activity for 10 years for IT/ ITES units in public or private IT Parks in Zone-I registered with the Directorate of Industries. 
  2. Exemption for payment of electricity duty from the date of commencement of production/ activity for 15 years for IT/ ITES units in public or private IT Parks in areas other than zone-I registered with the Directorate of Industries. Exemption for payment of electricity duty permanently for units in SEZ IT SEZs, in IT Parks in SEZs, single IT units in SEZs and 100% Exporting IT & ITeS units under registration of STPI or other designated competent authority.
data.how_to_apply:
1. Users can register on the website: www.di.maharashtra.gov.in for availing services. 
  2. A soft copy of the documents (PAN Card ) must be uploaded during the registration process. (Please note that system will only allow uploading of documents in PDF format with a maximum size of 5 MB.) 
  3. On successful registration the user will receive an activation pin code by email and SMS at their registered email address and mobile number. 
  4. This code is used to validate user registration to complete the registration process.
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after the approval of the concerned authority.
data.highlights: Investor's Guide Directorate of Industries, Government of Maharashtra
data.faq: Investor's Guide Directorate of Industries, Government of Maharashtra
data.additional_info: If an Existing Unit, makes on or after commencement of this Policy, minimum 25% additional fixed capital investment in IT &ITES/AVGC activity, then such project will be considered as Expansion/ Diversification Project.
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate 
GST Certificate 
Financials for Last 2 years 
Projected financial data 
Lending Bank Details 
Basic KYC Documents 
Online submission of report on 2% Incubation Space in an IT Park by a developer
Online Submission of Six-Monthly Report
Detailed Project Report
